content: Can anyone tell me if there are publicly available auth server implementations that support UDAP Dynamic Client Registration?

Hi @David Pyke Accumulating a list of test servers at this spreadsheet which is also used for connectathons. Link to publicly available UDAP test tool is also included: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1awkXXQaeuRv5ysLo8R6f1fpfBlpTJGfSPK4xRjsai7M/edit#gid=820206691 - probably want to contact these orgs out of band if testing between HL7 connectathons.
